scripts.docs:dev: npm run docs && vuepress dev docs .temp
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs && vuepress build docs
scripts.test-ci: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --require test/support/env --reporter spec --check-leaks --no-exit test/**/**.spec.js test/acceptance/
scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --require test/support/env --reporter dot --check-leaks --no-exit test/**/**.spec.js test/acceptance/
